long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LeadZLab is a "Keyword" focused Lead generation platform, that allows users to monitor keywords across Reddit and LinkedIn with the objective of plugging-in their own service. The extension allows users to allow LeadZLab to monitor LinkedIn Keywords on their behalf
